ðŸ“– Summary: Desktop Homunculus is a Rust-based application that uses the Bevy game engine to create interactive desktop pets. It features AI-powered chat integration with ChatGPT and VoiceVox, advanced VRM character support, and an extensible MOD system for customization. The application aims to enhance the user experience by providing a personalized and engaging desktop companion.
